bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.note: The coinage in circulation and the life-span of issues. - The geographical distribution and its interpretation for Kellis. - Numismatic evidence for the date of the abandonment. - Notes. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: BOWEN Gillian E., A Suggested Interpretation of the Coin-finds of Ismant el-Kharab.
C.A. MARLOW and A.J. MILLS (Edd.), The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 6 (Oxford, 2001) pp. 60-64, 4 tabl.
